title: Athlete

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player to wrestle. Roleblock them if they have less than powerful defense.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Wrestling a player twice instead silently controls them into visiting you (regardless of their defense level). You don't learn their role.
- Roleblock, control immune
- Your first wrestle doesn't have to succeed in roleblocking them to make your second wrestle control them.
- Your two wrestles don't have to be in a row to make your second wrestle control them.
- *__Made for the Curated role list__*

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Hang those who oppose the town.

desc:
Post 5179
*"Everyone has their influences. One day, I hope to be as good as mine."*
